QuestData.Title: A Blade is a Blade
QuestData.Description: This is no time to hold to tradition. Our masons' calloused hands bleed and tremble. Our blacksmiths cannot forge weapons as quickly as our sentinels can break them.$b$bIt is time to fight smart.$b$bMany of the mantid come bearing weapons, and when they die, they simply leave them on the battlefield. It would be a shame to see them go to waste.
